name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability to execute unauthorized scripts and exfiltrate sensitive data.

parallel--4c23bd8a-fd93-4f58-b4aa-2458d4.name: Immediate Mitigation Actions
parallel--4c23bd8a-fd93-4f58-b4aa-2458d4.description: Execute immediate actions to mitigate the threat.

action--c53b2804-1034-4a9e-8536-9a9b69c5.name: Kill malicious process
action--c53b2804-1034-4a9e-8536-9a9b69c5.description: Terminate any processes associated with the unauthorized script.

action--2e4b568d-0955-4ee7-b8b1-edf02bd3.name: Isolate affected host
action--2e4b568d-0955-4ee7-b8b1-edf02bd3.description: Isolate the host to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--a6673ec9-5cd4-4393-8d56-9a6de265.name: Scan network for other instances
action--a6673ec9-5cd4-4393-8d56-9a6de265.description: Perform a network scan to identify any other potentially compromised hosts.

loop--58f31054-3da3-4941-9ffa-0d03451d55.name: Network Scan Loop
loop--58f31054-3da3-4941-9ffa-0d03451d55.description: Repeat network scan until no more suspicious hosts are found.
